title: TPG Co-Heads Talk Disruption, Bridgestone CEO Sees ‘Tiger Effect’, China Hikes Tariffs on U.S.
itunes:title: TPG Co-Heads Talk Disruption, Bridgestone CEO Sees ‘Tiger Effect’, China Hikes Tariffs on U.S.
description:
Jason Kelly shares details of his interview with TPG Co-CEOs Jim Coulter and Jon Winkelried, they explain their contrarian strategy in the private equity industry. Dan Murphy, CEO at Bridgestone, discusses the impact Tiger Woods has had on golf sales since winning the Masters. Andy Browne, Editorial Director of Bloomberg New Economy, discusses China’s plan to raise duties on some American imports starting June 1, defying a call from President Trump to resist escalating a trade war. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Startup Reporter Eric Newcomer, break down Uber's shares taking another hit on only their second day of trading. And we Drive to the Close withAnn Miletti, Senior Portfolio Manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. 

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs.  Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
